item.title: I still dont understand
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

I guess i know whats ur problem, r u setting the right jdk update or jre6 in run/compiler/runserver codes ?

for example u will see something like this in the code ( when u press right click - edit - ):

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_XX\bin\javac.exe

The XX is the update of ur jdk if u want to know whats ur update go to C: then program files then java and it should be there.

The latest jdk update is 1.6.0_25 i think so if u have this one the code should look like this :

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe

for me i wont use this kind of codes here is a code for compiler which doesnt need editing.

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles(x86)%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

for me this works on most compilers. hope i helped

Read full topic
